verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:4
verses.text: And the meat of his table, and the sitting of his servants, and the attendance of his ministers, and their apparel; his cupbearers also, and their apparel; and his ascent by which he went up into the house of the Lord; there was no more spirit in her.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:5
verses.text: And she said to the king, It was a true report which I heard in mine own land of thine acts, and of thy wisdom:
